page.title: 07THE GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Children play games in their spare time, some games are for one person some for a group, some games you need equipment, some don't. {MUMMY'S AND DADDY'S}Young children play mummys and daddys, it usually involves a doll as a baby or children crouching down. Young children copy what they have seen etc. {IT}Most children whatever age play IT, It is most popular in the 7-11 age group. There are different kinds of IT but the standard IT has two homes (trees, circles etc) 1 person has to try and catch other people, but you cannot get them when there on homes. Different types of IT are Victory, Stuck-in-the-Mud, Old Man. {SKIPPING}involves a rope to jump over there are skipping songs. {C J Samson { C S Harvey
